Detailed Description

Implementation of the SBW remote procedure call protocol.

The actual connection setup, disconnect and data transmission is abstracted via virtual functions.

void SBWRPC::cleanup (    )  [protected]
 

recover resources and notify listeners after this module disconnects from the broker.

Shutsdown incoming call processing threads and throws exceptions in outstanding outgoing calls.
